title: How are computers used in a library? - Quora

response.answer_text: Computers are used to allow people to access the catalog. They allow people to place holds on books that they wish to borrow. They also can allow access to databases that can be used. They can be used for just about anything in a library that needs to be cataloged.
Yes Computers can be use in a Library for keep records of books that how many books are available in the book stalk. How many are the members of that Library etc. f
